title: *True 2-Bedroom & 2-Bathroom Apt w/Balcony-Heart of Bushwick* 1009 3B
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We are the exclusive brokers for this building', '*True 2-Bedroom & 2-Bathroom Apartment with a Balcony in the Heart of Bushwick*', 'The pictures are showing the actual available unit - I took them myself!', '*The Apartment Features:*', '2 Queen-Size Bedrooms on Opposite Sides of the Apartment / Built-in Closet in Each Bedroom / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Lots of Natural Light / 2 Full Bathrooms - one with a Deep Tub and one with a Standing Shower / Separate and Sunny Living Room with a *Balcony* / AC Unit in Each Room / L-Shaped Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher and Microwave / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / Video Intercom /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Laundry Room / Courtyard / Rooftop /', 'Two Blocks Away from Maria Hernandez Park', 'A Step Away from the M Train and a Short walk to J/Z/L Trains', "Enjoy the Best Things that Bushwick has to offer just Around the Corner: Fine Time, Bushwick Bakery, Farewell Bar, Cafe Moca, Henry's Wine & Spirit, Carmenta’s, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, and So Much More to Explore!", '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $132,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
